Pre-Game Insights: Josh Schonwald's Pick: Take New York
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Mets are sitting with a team ERA of 4.14 this year (20th in MLB), and their staff has rung up 1,179 hitters.
The Chicago White Sox have accumulated a team on-base percentage of.278 and a team batting average of.220 on the year.
Others: The game is scheduled to take place at Guaranteed Rate Field in Chicago, IL.
The starting pitchers are Sean Manaea and Garrett Crochet.
